title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for interior analysis

1 point is earned for endpoint analysis

1 point is earned for the answer

g is increasing on [-2, 3] and decreasing on [3, 4].

Therefore, g has absolute minimum at an endpoint of [-2, 4].

Since g(-2) = -6 and g(4) = 5 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca aI1aaabaGaaGOmaaaaaaa@3781@ , the absolute minimum value is -6.
